item.title: Vengence bug
item.dc:creator: @season_scape season_scape
item.description:
@season_scape wrote:

case 51039: if(Vengeance >= 1) { sendMessage("You must wait one minute before activating vengeance again."); } if(Vengeance <= 0 && hitTimer <= 0 && playerLevel[6] >= 96 && PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null) { Vengeance = 120; hitTimer = 10; hitCount = 0; stillgfx(441, absY, absX); startAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste Vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; sendMessage("You activate Vengeance!."); } if(playerLevel[6] <= 95) { sendMessage("You need to be at least 96 magic to activate Vengeance."); } if(!(PlayerHandler.players[AttackingOn] != null)) { sendMessage("You must be in combat to activate Vengeance."); } break;

heres mine this replaces thelast tele in acient hopes it helps, but u can just change case 51039: to case 162

item.description:
@joeyjoe9876 wrote:

ok when some1 on my server uses venge they log out heres my code tell me wat i did wrong

case 162: { if (actionTimer == 0) { { actionTimer = 10; stillgfx(642, absY, absX); for (int I = 0; I < 20; I++) {} for (int I = 0; I <= 6; I++) { strPot = true; strPotTimer = 90; cba = abc / 10; abc2 = cba * 2; if (abc2 <= 1) { abc2 = 2; } updateRequired = true; appearanceUpdateRequired = true; break; } inCombat(); attackPlayersWithin(600, 17, 1); setAnimation(1979); txt4 = "Taste vengeance!"; string4UpdateRequired = true; RemoveAllWindows(); } }
